text: Muntiny on the Bounty is a 1962 American adventure drama movie directed by Lewis Milestone and is the second adaption of the 1932 novel of the same name. It stars Marlon Brando, Trevor Howard, Richard Harris, Hugh Griffin, Richard Haydn, Tarita Teriipaia, Duncan Lamont, Gordon Jackson and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for seven Academy Awards in 1963 and was a box-office bomb. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1962 adventure movies Category:1962 drama movies Category:1960s epic movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about rebellions Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies set in the 1780s Category:Movies set in the 18th century Category:Movies set in French Polynesia Category:Movies directed by Lewis Milestone Category:MGM movies
title: Mutiny on the Bounty (1962 movie)
